name: Paper Lamp
description:
Less materials - Simple Structure - Less Procedures

Inspired by origami, this simple geometric lamp shade is made by a kind of sustainable and innovative Bamboo paper from Conqueror, the shape is held by pins.

The wooden support is constructed without using any screw and glue, it is jointed by an interlocking structure. It is made by solid wood protected by a natural plant oil-wax.

Materials/ Conqueror Bamboo paper, wood 
Plug/ British standard (250V/13AMP) or Europlug (2.5A/ 250V).
Bulb/ 14W max E27, compact fluorescent lamo (bulb excluded)
Size/ L32 H56 W28
Weight/ 500g

HKDA Global Design Awards 2011 (Gold Awards, HK Best, Judges’ Choices)

name: "TREE" - Ring Holder / Necklace Holder
description:
Taking real natural twig and reconstructing it into a resin home accessories objects with the original shape and texture. The design concept is to celebrate the beauty and magic of the natural world, and bring them home. Ring Holder Materials/ Stone Powder, Resin Size/ L8.3 H16 W4 cm Weight/ 111g Necklace Holder Materials/ Stone Powder, Resin Size/ L15 H35 W7.2cm Weight/ 436g Brand/ Feel Good Home Designed by/ Milk Design
